title: Kiitarou Shounen no Youkai Enikki: Jonan no Saijitsu

synonyms: Young Kiitarou and His Youkai Picture Diary
Kiitarou Shounen no Youkai Enikki ep 13
alternative_titles.ja: 奇異太郎少年の妖怪絵日記 女難の祭日

synopsis: An unaired episode 13 of Kiitarou Shounen no Youkai Enikki included on the DVD/BD release. Kiitarou runs into typical ecchi manga tropes due to Lucky Eros albeit he doesn't feel "lucky" and tries to avoid everything happening between him and the female youkai.
